attributes.action: Uphold Democracy in the United Kingdom - No to a second referendum
attributes.additional_details: People in the United Kingdom democratically voted on a major political issue in our country. The whole country needs to stand up for democracy irrespective as to how they voted in the referendum. A re- run of that vote will throw away the democracy of the United Kingdom forever and sets a  precedent that will haunt us in the future. We must honor that vote and show the rest world we are true to our word. Our history is our respect, it will embrace us one day
attributes.background: Do not overturn democracy in the United Kingdom
